movie.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
movie.writer: Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas, Philip Kaufman
movie.actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
movie.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
movie.language: English, German, Hebrew, Spanish, Arabic, Nepali
movie.awards: Won 5 Oscars. 37 wins and 24 nominations total
